comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Thomas Nelson Page (1853-1922), a Virginia lawyer, was the author of numerous popular books, most of them celebrating a romanticized version of the antebellum South. He was US Ambassador to Italy from 1913 to 1919. NNDB page.

comment.author: 14936048@N07
comment._content: He is pictured on Pennsylvania Avenue in front of the Old Executive Office Building next to the White House. Notice the distinct mansard roof.
